b"@AlinCatalin Feedback from others is great too (and needed). The downside is it can lead you on a wild goose chase building features if you don't carefully vet it and determine if it's valid for your product's direction."

b'"What should I build?"

Work on problems you have a firsthand understand of & build something that solves your own need.

Otherwise you'll be relying solely on others for product insight. Even if it doesn't become a viable business at least you built something YOU need \xf0\x9f\x91\x8d'

b'I'm guilty of this: "Always Launching"

Makers fall in love with launching and making a "splash" but the real work begins after that
